amendatorysection.para: Any corporation described in section 76-3706 violating such section shall be construed and held to be a nonresident alien and within the provisions of the Foreign-owned Real Estate National Security Act applicable to nonresident aliens. Any such domestic corporation violating section 76-3706 shall forfeit its charter and be dissolved. Any such foreign corporation violating section 76-3706 shall forfeit its right to do business in the State of Nebraska.
